named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskLog.readByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTaskLog( taskLog.processId,taskLog.processInstanceId,taskLog.id,taskLog.name,taskLog.actualOwner,taskLog.status,taskLog.workItemId ) FROM AuditTaskImpl taskLog WHERE taskLog.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskLog.readByProcessInstanceId
